column2: "Hmph, you sure are raring to go, aren't you? But can you really use techniques? I mean, you ARE a loser, after all."
"The Darkers are crawling forth in swarms, so it'll be dangerous if you don't take it seriously."
"I'll be watching to see if you stay the right distance away from those hostiles and calmly pelt them with techniques. Loser."
